text: Muzio is an Italian given name and surname. Notable people with the given name include: *Muzio Clementi (1752-1832), Italian composer *Muzio Sforza (1369-1424), Italian nobleman and condottiero, father of Francesco I Sforza, Duke of Milan Notable people with the surname include: *Christine Muzio (born 1951), French fencer *Claudia Muzio (1889–1936), Italian operatic soprano *Emanuele Muzio (1821–1890), Italian composer, conductor and vocal teacher *Giovanni Muzio (1893-1982), Italian architect *Girolamo Muzio (1496–1576), Italian courtier, poet, and author in defence of the vernacular Italian language against Latin *Gloria Muzio, American theatre and television director ==See also== *Picco Muzio
title: Muzio
